stages.text: Sometimes, alchemy is not enough. Sometimes, we have to.. Look to the Edges.

Witchcraft has always captivated me. I have read books and listened to tales of many a powerful witch controlling their foes with Poppets, or summoning evil demons to do their bidding. What if i engaged myself in this art too?
Any good witch needs their tools.. Perhaps further dusting my Crucible with Salis Mundus could improve its witching capabilities. I need to take apart a crucib
A fashionable oven, made to withstand the pressures of elixir-making.

Regular brewing-stands and extracting machinae are not enough for the more Advanced processes required for Witchcraft. Though, I think i may be able to engineer a machine that can handle these stresses..
The Distillery is a machine capable of extracting pure essences, things that are purer than Essentia itself..

Regular brewing-stands and extracting machinae are not enough for the more Advanced processes required for Witchcraft. Though, I think i may be able to engineer a machine that can handle these stresses.. I shall need to dust an Essentia Smeltery to find out.
The Witches' Cauldron is a station capable of brewing advanced potions, Much beyond the capabilities of basic potions...
The demons will not rise if i do not summon them. An altar should allow me to pique the interest of the demons, and also gain some more exotic materials..

This Altar should be able to arise the curiosity of the Demons. I should add some greenery around it, to increase the power of the Altar... Maybe some other kinds of magic implements would also serve me well.

Regular crafting tables are not sufficient for crafting string efficiently, let alone crafting magical fibres... I may be able to engineer a machine that allows me to handle fibres more accurately, thus allowing for the creation of some very special fibres...
The Spinning Wheel should help me weave delicate fibers, infused with the essence of Vis.
